reviews.review:
Одиночная игра:

1. Сюжет очень продуман и его сложно предугадать
2. Головоломки не дадут скучать. На некоторые можно убить десятки минут
3. 10 из 10

Кооператив:

1. Все очень даже годно, не считая того, что мало уровней
2. Если Вы с напарником любите "фармить" достижения, то Вам придется попотеть, чтобы получить их все
3. 9 из 10

Данная игра стоит внимания и если Вы по какой-то причине не прошли ее или вовсе не играли, то советую. Кооператив тоже не оставит Вас равнодушным. Игра стоит своих денег и тянет даже на слабеньких ПК, что определенно плюс...

~ DIFFICULTY ~

🔲 My 90 year old grandma could play it
✅ Easy   (basic controls made for everyone to enjoy but can be challenging at times)
🔲 Normal
🔲 Hard 
🔲 Hardcore

~ GRAPHICS ~

🔲 MS Paint
🔲 Bad
✅ Meh    (good for its time but not in 2021)
🔲 Graphics dont matter in this game
🔲 Good
🔲 Beautiful
🔲 Masterpiece

~ MUSIC ~

🔲 Bad
✅ Not special
🔲 Good
🔲 Beautiful

~ STORY ~

🔲 This game has no story
🔲 Like playing Temple Runners for the story
🔲 It's there for the people who want it
🔲 Well written
✅ Epic story
🔲 Imagine the complex lore of Kingdom Hearts but on crack

~ PRICE ~

🔲 Free
✅ Underpriced 
🔲 Perfect Price
🔲 Could be cheaper
🔲 Overpriced
🔲 Complete waste of money

~ REQUIREMENTS ~

✅ You can run it on a microwave
🔲 Average
🔲 High end
🔲 NASA computer

~ LENGTH ~

🔲 Very Short (0 - 2 hours)
🔲 Short (2 - 15 hours) (Singleplayer)
✅ Average (15-50 hours)
🔲 Long (50-90 hours)
🔲 Extremely long (90-110 hours)
🔲 No ending (Multiplayer)

~ FUN ~

🔲 I'd rather watch paint dry
🔲 Hard to enjoy
🔲 Repetitive
🔲 Actually pretty amusing
✅ The kind of fun youll remember
🔲 Ride of your life

~ REPLAYABILITY~

🔲 It's a one-time experience
🔲 Only for achievements (Singleplayer)
🔲 If you wait a few months/years
✅ Definitely
🔲 Infinitely replayable (Multiplayer)

~ WORTH BUYING ~

🔲 No
🔲 Wait for sale
✅ Yes
Amazing! Best Game Ever! Go Buy It Now!! (:
Amazing games great story line and gameplay
Portal 2 is the best game on Steam. The graphics are good even in 2021, the story is excellent, and it has some challenging puzzles. It's well worth the price.
재미있어서 도전과제 도전했는데 같이 할 친구가 없어서 포기했습니다
Замечательная игра, в которой всё выполнено наилучшим образом. Очень хочется 3 часть.
ДОСТОЙНОЕ ПРОДОЛЖЕНИЕ ПЕРВОЙ ЧАСТИ С ХОРОШЕЙ ГРАФИКОЙ И ПРИЯТНЫМ ГЕЙМПЛЕЕМ
Shout out to this game fr fr

Best puzzle game ever (fine -- one of the best ones at least :-) ). 
The co-op option makes it a great couples game.
INNOVATIONS! no game like this game... I'm 35... been playing games my whole life... no game like this... gimme portal 3...
Amazing game, amazing storyline, amazing amazingness, worth more than its price! Tbh better then portal 1 :)

Top
Portal 2 — неотделимый от первой части эксперимент. Это головоломка для всех. это великолепная история и безупречный стиль. Это одна из лучших кооперативных игр, если уж на то пошло. 
Достойное продолжение легендарной игры Portal.
Игра заставляет тебя быть в положение того что ты не контролируешь всё что с тобой происходит мне понравилось
Не знаю Зачем Писать Про Плюсы Игры В 2021-2022 Если Она Вышла 2011 И Про Неё Все Знают. Но Она Топ! Головоломки, Модели, Сюжет, Напряжение!
1和2代单人剧情都通了,就是没有人陪我玩双人模式哈哈哈哈哈哈嗝
Really good game I recommend it strongly and if you haven't played it yet then what are you doing? just play it.
игра хорошая, интересная, советую попробовать с друзьями
норм игра но берите когда на него скидка полную сумму он не стоит ну если вам нечего сыграть но покупайте с друзьями
топ игра, проходил несколько раз, крутая игра +rep
Try to not end your friend's life simulator.

Portal 2 is most likely one of my favorite games and in my opinion, is extremely close to a perfect game. Valve took so much time and effort into portal 2 and they made it amazing. The ending, execution,comedy, all these things are done and performed so well by Valve it's actually scary how good they can do it. I'd 100% recommend this game, you won't be disappointed.
this game made me break down in tears at the end

This is probably my favorite game. it has a great story, the puzzles are intuitive, yet challenge you as the game progresses, the dynamically changing music is wonderful, i really liked the voiceacting, and all of it works together wonderful. The games tone is a masterful mix of humor and dark undertones. 

good job, boys
This game is the best game I have ever played! it has a great storyline and really well made mechanics.
Melhor jogo de puzzle que eu já joguei, muito bom mesmo, cheio de enigmas complexos e com uma ideia genial.
This is such an amazing game. If you haven't bought it by now what are you even doing
Its Portal 2, instant classic, and tons of free content to keep ya playing.
It was a great game, loved it. Even after so many years this game still have great graphics.
So much creativity with the new mechanics and puzzles.  The co-op option is icing on the cake.
Buenísimo juego, me encanta su historia y sus personajes. Totalmente recomendado
Amazing puzzles, Great voice acting, and a really fun story. A must-play.
Arguably a better game than the first which delivers an interesting story whilst keeping the same premise fun. Also GLaDOS is bae
Great game, I usually only play shooters and saw this was rated high so I bought it. Keeps you thinking, the game is goofy but in a good way it kept me interested.

já si myslím že tohle je snad nejlepší logická hra s portály a taky jedna z nejlepších her od Valve

rozhodně doporučuji xd

Portal 2 is a mind-blowing puzzle game that I would recommend to anyone. Alongside its fantastic physics and unique puzzles, it has a fantastic narrative with very complex characters. A great, polished game in every aspect.
ИГРА крутая на логику и крутой сюжет
It is very brain hurting but fun, plus the community is great
